title.rendered: Devon Skin Marker Regular Tip w/ Ruler

content.rendered:
The Devon Surgical Skin Marker is a sterile, single use marker designed to meet the specialized needs of today’s surgeons. The skin marker is non-toxic, non-smearing and contains non-irritating Gentian Violet ink.

Devon Surgical Skin Marker helps your facility meet the needs of correct site marking. The marker comes packaged with a flexible ruler in individuals or boxes of 25.

Features

  • Regular tip
  • Flexible ruler included
  • Latex-free
  • Non-toxic
  • Non-smearing
  • Non-irritating Gentian Violet ink
  • Available as individual packs or box of 25
